headline: Jim Cramer Calls Hubbell a “Fantastic American Industrial Company”
summary: Hubbell Incorporated (NYSE:HUBB) is one of the stocks on Jim Cramer’s radar. A caller asked if the stock is currently a buy, hold, or sell, and mentioned the company’s recent appointment of a new CFO. In response, Cramer said: “I just want to stay long. No need to buy it up here because this thing […]
